name: 3ds Max Scene File
summary: Learn about .MAX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Graphics professionals in the video game, film, television, and architecture industries use 3ds Max to create 3D models and animations. When you save a project with 3ds Max, the application creates a 3ds Max scene (MAX file) to store the contents. After saving the project, you can close it and re-open it to continue editing it.
NOTE: 3ds Max was previously known as 3D Studio MAX, which saved scenes in the MAX and .3DS formats. You can still export scenes as 3DS files with 3ds Max 2022 (and earlier versions).

instructions: To open .max file, you will need Autodesk 3ds Max installed on your computer. Open software, go to “File” menu, and choose “Open” or “Import.” Navigate to location of .max file, select it, and click “Open.” The software will load contents of .max file, allowing you to explore and edit 3D scene within Autodesk 3ds Max’s workspace.
You can open a MAX file with Autodesk 3ds Max in Windows. To do so, select File → Open... from the 3ds Max menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your MAX file.

Autodesk 3ds Max offers capability to convert MAX files into different formats e.g.

.AI - Adobe Illustrator Artwork.DWG - AutoCAD Drawing.DXF - Drawing Exchange Format.FBX - Autodesk FBX Interchange File.IGES - IGES Drawing.STL - Stereolithography File
